content.old: since pull request #1168, if a spacenav is detected, gazebo automatically allows view point control using the spacenav.  This behavior precludes use of spacenav for other purposes (e.g. manipulate links in gazebo). It would be nice to be able to disable

issue.title: option to use spacenav for user camera view point control
